content.detailedDescription:
I took my dog out around 5am this morning and exited the building from the north entrance. i always look up and the skies were perfectly clear and it was still dark.  

we walked around to the front of the complex on the south side and re-entered the building and then exited the building again on the west side. i didn't look up again until we reached the south side again, and when i did, i saw a huge big white contrail of smoke or clouds that was very low and looked to be literally right over my building that wasn't there before. i could only see that the direction of the trail was stretched diagonally from somewhere over my building going towards out over the highway extension behind my building. 

i must repeat that when i'd looked up at the sky more or less in that same spot about 10 minutes before that, there was absolutely nothing there. i didn't see anything or hear a single sound and there was no breeze either. i wish i'd thought to get a picture of it with my camera at the time but for some reason i didn't. it's actually pretty unnerving to think of what could have made a large trail of smoke like that right over my building and for me to not have seen or heard a thing just prior to it.
content.summary: Huge contrail right over my apartment building

content.detailedDescription:
I couldn't really categorize this as a ufo but i still think it could be some kind of strange phenomena.

first of all i'd recently started bringing my camera with me whenever i went out because of some strange things that i was noticing lately in general. 

as i took my dog for a walk, just around the corner from my apartment building in miami near the 826 highway, i just looked up at the rain clouds for a second and noticed what looked like a noticeable dark circle in the cloud cover. i immediately took a few snap shots with my camera. what made it even more interesting to me is that over the past few months or so, once or twice i'd seen what looked like a very bright flickering light that resembled a star in more or less that same area. 

i've seen the light look gold-colored and i've also seen it look more white on another occasion. about a week and a half before the cloud sighting i was on my balcony and saw the small flickering light in that same spot and my neighbor was out walking his dog with his small daughter. they'd seen it too because i saw them looking in that direction and i heard her ask him what it was and he replied that he didn't know. that night i first saw it around 8pm or so, and i went back in to eat some dinner for about 15 or 20 minutes, and when i went back out to look at it again, it was gone. the skies were clear so if it was a star, there were no clouds that could have moved in front of it.  

i think there was something strange going on here last summer that started as far back as june and as i've said i'd seen some strange things in the sky and experienced things like waking up with a very loud ringing in my right ear one night and occasionally hearing a single loud electronic-sounding beep in my ears always when i was just about to doze off. again i know this report isn't exactly about a ufo but i still think it's kind of strange.
content.summary: Dark circle above cloud cover

content.detailedDescription:
I can see a circle faintly in the sky its spinning round hovering flashing blue red and green it has been hovering for the last half an hour and still doing so i have recorded it and rewinded the tape back to watch it 
its soo wierd its like skipping and bouncing it is still there but is moving up.
content.summary: Circle figer hovering

content.detailedDescription:
I took this picture while on holiday in western australia just south of perth at a place called rockingham,just to the left of the image is garden island naval base.
i never noticed the object in the top left hand corner untill a year after the phto was taken,it was taken on my nokia n95 mobile phone and i was taking a picture of a pelican and never noticed anything unusual on the morning.
the sun had only just risen to the right
content.summary: Taken on rockinhgam beach

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of my son playing in the snow and of the house, and when we came inside i put the pictures on my laptop. the attached anomaly showed up when i was reviewing the photos. in the marked area of the original photo you can't make out the anomaly at full size, but at 300% magnification you begin to see what is a distinct triangle silhouetted against the clouds with a dark squarish shape on the bottom. we never saw the object when we were outside, it only became apparent in the photo.The other photos contain no similar feature.
content.summary: Found when reviewing pictures

content.detailedDescription: I heard a noise last night at 11:30 pm. i went outside but saw nothing. this morning i walked down my driveway to get my morning paper, and in the snow in my driveway were two perfectly concentric circles one inside the other. the outside diameter of the outer circle was 15.5 feet and the inner circle 13.5 feet. there were four rectangular foot pads set in a pattern on the outside circle at what would be n/s/e/w on a compass. they were 7.5 inches long and flared on their ends. i have taken pictures of the circles and closeups of the foot pads. i have no idea what could have placed this pattern in the snow. their were no other signs of disturbance in the snow.
content.summary: A pattern of a 15.5 foot circle with foot pads in the snow

content.detailedDescription:
Our aircraft was conducting a resupply mission to tuzla, bosnia herzegovina.  we were somewhere between fl 150 and 210 and our heading was west/northwest heading for the airspace of northern italy.

while still in close proximity of tuzla there was a thunderstorm slightly to the left of the nose of our aircraft.  behind the thunderstorm was the slowly setting sun which still appeared to be 20-30 degrees above the horizon.

what caught my attention was a bright like similar to a star that was "playing" in the vicinity of the thunderstorm.  it was on the side of teh storm closest to us.  the objects altitude appeared to be a few thousand feet lower than ours and was performing a series of random high speed maneuvers.  

there were nato combat air patrol aircraft in the general area but command and control authorities remarked that there was nothing seen in the that vicinity.  the object was conducting maneuvers that are considered technologically impossible by today's standards.

the fellow crew members took note of the object but seemed disinterested.

after "playing" for several minutes the object disappeared.
content.summary: Star like object performing high-g acrobatics near a thunderstorm

content.detailedDescription:
My crew and i were flying our aircraft from cairo egypt to dhahran saudi arabia.  when our location was approximately due south of tabuk (unk distance), we spotted a star like object in the distance off of our right wing(200 heading) and at about 30-50 miles.  within seconds a very bright beam had projected down onto the cloud deck below like a searchlight.  the searchlight itself did not appear to be actively moving.

our aircraft was at approximately fl 210-230, heading approximately 110 degrees.  the object 

the object was at a similar altitude, appeared stationary and the cloud deck below was around 10-12k msl.

at first we thought it was another aircraft but there was little chatter on the atc frequencies that would indicate traffic in our area.  a helicopter was ruled out due to altitude.  their were no anti-collision lights nor navigational lights from the object that could be seen.

it is possible a rsaf c-130 based at jeddah was conducting night operations and the retracted landing lights could have been turned on causing the "searchlight" appearance.  the lack of other lighting makes this unlikely.

the only initial feeling aboard the aircraft was of puzzlement  this faded fairly quickly as explanations were running out and it seemed as if the other crew members would rather forget about the sighting.

the object was in our view for about 3-5 minutes before we lost sight of it as it passed behind our aircraft.

i do not have charts and flight logs available to give more accurate information.

there was no significant weather in the area.
content.summary: Large light at high altitude shining spotlight below it

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i were returning from getting some burgers and turn westbound off of hwy 54 facing white sands national park when my mother stated that that orange light that was above the mountains in the sky looked like the unexplained lights looked the week before she and my sister saw but they turned two two lights and no sooner did she state that the light became 2 lights and then emerging from the the ufo another light would appear as if it was coming from inside the ufo to its left. it did this until there were 8 in a perfect row horizontaly and then 2 more appeared to the left of the 8 and then they dispeared into the night.
content.summary: One orange light appeared and multiplied into ten lights and then disapeared

content.detailedDescription: I was driving northbound from modesto through ripon heading towards manteca where my fiance and i noticed a very bright set of lights in the sky hovering on the left hand side of highway 99, 1/4 of a mile from ripon high school. we thought the lights were from a tower at first until we noticed the object spinning slowly as the outside lights glowed off and on with out a pattern. i said "i think it's a ufo" and as we drove by the object, it was clear that there was nothing holding the lights in the air as it was hovering on it's own. the center light glowed diferent colors as the outside lights changed from white to orange to red with out blinking. i then turned off the highway to turn around so i could get a photo or a video from my phone but by the time we got back on the highway and to the spot of the sighting, the object was gone. the duration of time of the sighting was roughly around 3 minutes. the object seem to be at about 600 ft agl and the size was roughly around 30 yards from point to point. i swear on everything that i have seen the same object in videos as well with the same exact characteristics. i'm baffled!
content.summary: Hovering triangle with 3 lights on the outside and one glowing light in center

content.detailedDescription: At appro.3am.I and my fellow emp. walked outside for our last brake.Of our.10hr.Shift.It was a very warm clear nite.As we sat someone said look.Over there and pointed.Se.Across a field at what looked like police lights appro.1mile.We all laughed thinking at bar time somebody got busted these lights were staionary.For at lest 10min.As i was looking at the lights they started rise slowly and move right towards us.By this time there was only a few of us still outside becouse brake was pretty much was over.Now thinking this was a heilecopter i got up and walked towards the object.As i got closer to the feild i noted there was no noise.I stoped and whached it came right towards me and was maybe1.Half mi. away andmaybe 500 feet high.Im looking at this thing and all of sudden it disapeard just like shuting off alight it was gone.I stade there looking but it was gone.I turned and was probley 20 feet from the door of my work place when ilooked up to the n.West and saw avery bright white flash very high in the sky.It looked like a comet.During this entire time i never was scared.Just dumfonded.
content.summary: Took place on my work brake

content.detailedDescription:
I was awakened by an extremely bright white light outside my second floor bedroom window - there were no curtains on the window. i got out of bed and went to the window to see why it was so bright at that time of night. a huge disc was moving slowly west to east -- silently. the disc had very bright white lights shining from underneath (app. 150 yards away). it was as bright as daylight. blue circular lights were on the lower portion, outer perimeter - it could have been portholes with blue light from inside the craft; the blue light did not shine as brightly as the white light-it couldn't be seen as readily. in between the blue "portholes" were what appeared to me to be rivets but to be that visible they had to have been rather large. the disc was about the length of a football field (100 yds) with the height about 1/3 the length. it was descending as though landing but i was unable to view a "landing" because a stand of trees interfered with my view to the left. so i don't know if it landed or took off. once it passed my window the bright light was gone; i couldn't see much farther across the road and to the left.

the area at the time was not well populated although now it is a very busy suburb of philadelphia. the area across the road was open fields with trees lining the road on the eastern end of the field. there was no traffic, in those days, at that time of night.

i remember checking the clock but i don't remember if it was when i awoke or when i returned to bed; i knew i had to remember the time and the date although i never told anyone in my family about it. my brothers' bedrooms were in the back of the house and mine was in the front; no one else was awake or stirring in the house. i had no doubt that i had seen a craft that was "different".
content.summary: Bright, silent angled descent of  huge disc

content.detailedDescription:
During the late summer of 1978, myself and my now ex-wife were walking southeasterly on the 800 block of wrigley drive near the northern end of lake geneva. we were going back to our cars when we looked up and there was a saucer flying slowly above us. it was approx 150 yards away and 50 yards diameter. there were about 3 other people in our vacinity and they all saw it too. we all stopped and just stared up at it as it slowly moved about 100 yards or so from east to west. it then changed directions going away from us {southerly} at an ever increasing speed. 
we watched until it was out of sight. i remarked to my wife, "we have just seen a ufo". we then went into our car and started to leave on hwy 12 going south. when we reached county hwy u where it crossed hwy 12, it was fully dark. it was then we saw what we assumed was the same craft. only this time it was all light up. it had a wide band of lights around it and other markings. i can't really remember all of them after all this time. the second sighting was about 45-60 min later and lasted about four min. i pulled over to watch, but my wife got hysterical and wanted to leave. we drove on to milwaukee. 
i know what i saw was not of this world. i worked as an metallurgical r&d machinist for the "big b" (boeing) in washington state. 
i am not sure why i am reporting this now. we both felt absolute terror after seeing this. my wife more so. she feels we may have been abducted, and has talked about going to a hypnotist to see if any memories surface. i don't think so. i am pretty much a sceptic on that. 
some time after i reported it to the nufo center. i am just now reporting this. i was a member of mufon in 2008. but i didn't report it them and i don't know why.

content.summary: It was extremely fast  passing over my head while we were filming a short video in malibu, el matador beach.

content.detailedDescription: My wife, a retired school teacher, myself,  in austin and cross plains, texas were standing at the edge of a pasture west of the ranch house at 9:00 pm talking about our purchase of the 600 acre ranch he had for sale. we noticed a row of bright lights off to the west at treetop level and my wife making the statement,"it's not a plane because there are no flashing lights." we watched without speaking as the craft drew closer moving directly towards us a a very slow speed. when it was about a mile away i noticed the craft was huge, i mean it was gigantic and coming straight for us. as it passed directly overhead i was in disbelief and wonder as it blocked out the night sky. there was what i would describe as a round or circular gondola that lowered from the center of the underbelly being 20 to 30 ft. in diameter and coming out of the bottom of the craft about 10 to 15 ft. it is a part of the craft not seperate. it appeared as if they could raise it back into the craft or lower it at will. the gondola was glassed in with many seperate panes of glass 4 to 6 ft wide having a metallic bottom and 3 to 4 ft of metal at the top. the glass panes allowed us to clearly see the individuals in what resembled a control room atmosphere that comprised the interior of the gondola. the occupants of the gondola were humanoid in appearance but i was struck by the fact they were all the same size being thin and slightly long limbed as they moved about at what looked like control panels or monitors of some sort. i sensed a sense of urgency in their movements but cannot put into words why i felt that way. they seemed completely oblivious to our presense as thy went about their duties. the craft slowly moved across highway 279 continuing east at treetop level. we stood speechless for a moment and **********broke the silence with, "did you just see what i just thought i saw?" we said we had but we were all in an awed stupor of what's going on , our normal, safe, uneventful lives and world had been violated by images we were having trouble getting a grip on as our minds raced with so many thoughts. my wife said, "it's going to crash!" but as we waited in expectation of a terrible fireball and explosion, nothing happened. my wife and i do not share this event with others because we do not wish to be considered whacko's. but we saw what we saw! i am giving you this information to assist you as you compile information because i saw a gentleman ridiculed on fox news network by good people who just had no way of understanding what they had not seen for themslves. my wife and i are 66 yrs. of age, retired in a gated golf resort on lake whitney. we are affluent, respected members of our community and are willing at any time at our expense to take a lie detector examination. a sketch will be provided upon request. i do not wish to be contacted by a hoard of people and this is the reason i am supplying this information to you. i will co-operate with you and anyone who represents you. this is why i am checking the no box for third party contacts. i understand from others that you are a reputable group searching for truth.
content.summary: Moving west  to east, very slowly at treetop level, passing directly overhead,affording the three of us a detailed observation.

content.detailedDescription: It was around 9:15 pm on january 28th 2010.  my friend and i were driving up a mountain road on a very clear night and the moon looked brighter than i had ever seen it before. as we passed a house we saw something in the air that was completely still and very low.  like the georgia entry, this object had a bright white center light with blue white and red lights flashing around it.  as we stopped to watch it, it started flying away from us slowing so we turned the car around and started following it and as we did this it took off flying very quickly away.  we went back down the road as fast as we could and went to open fields to try to see it. we saw it still flying away from us, then it stopped, turned left and we watched it fly away for awhile.  as we went to leave we turned around and we saw another one flying over the mountain top and as we were watching this one fly either another one appeared or the one that we thought flew away had come back and now two of the objects were flying toward each other right above the tree line.  as they got close to each other they stopped.  both of them had bright white lights on the front and were facing each other, then all of the sudden both lights turned away from each other and pointed directly at our car and started moving slowly toward us.  at this point we freaked out and drove away to my friends house. we stood in my friends driveway and could kind of see them in the distance.  we went inside and hung out about an hour. little did we know this was just the beginning.  we left my friends house with him being very skeptical of our sighting but when we came to the fields again we saw another one, we started following it and when we came out where the tree line ended we saw at least 10 different objects in the sky all blinking colors and moving around, some of these were very close too.  as we drove closer the 4 closest objects started flashing a white light and moving away from us, as we got closer the white light got brighter and brighter until it looked like a sliver bright light flashing quickly.  we again freaked out and drove to my house.  when we got to my house i called the cops to see if anything was going on, if helicopters were looking for a missing person or something, and they said nothing was going on in the area.  as soon as i got off the phone, it is about 1120 now, we see about 6 of the objects in the sky above my house flying around, then we hear a loud noise and we could feel a vibration and three large bright orange circles appear from the tree tops in a triangle, they fly quickly over my house and disappear in the horizon, as soon as that was gone one of the ships flew above my front yard and a bright light started growing from the, i'm assuming, back of it. it stayed still as the light beam grew longer and was changing different colors (blues, reds, purples, yellows, everything) once the light beam was at least 100+ feet long it swooped over my house. my friends and i ran from the front to the back yard and watched it fly close over head, and as soon as it passed my over my house it let go of the light beam and the beam seemed to fall and turn into smoke that fell right above our heads and disappeared, as we saw this falling we shut the door and went inside. after all this happened, we called the police again to see if anyone saw anything and they said that they had a few calls of people reporting lights in the sky. i hung up the phone and we didnt see anything else really.  i felt very strange, i dont know if it was from them or from freaking out, but at one point i felt very sick and the letters on my computer screen started moving and we all felt very paranoid.  i was completely sober this entire time.  everything we saw was clear as day.  my digital camera wouldnt work when i tried to take a picture of them, and my video camera wasnt charged and everytime i took it out there was nothing around. i called the cops today to see if anything was reported about last night and the cop who had been on duty since 730 am said he had not heard one thing.  after i read the ufo sighting in georgia that happened the same night with the same objects, i knew something either very exciting or very scary had happened.  there was a small orb of light that was significantly brighter than the rest of the stars that was far in the sky above my house that i caught on video, and on the video you can see the orb change colors some, and it stayed very still while everything else was going on. i will try to upload that footage later
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw same thing as savannah, georgia but way more intense.

content.detailedDescription:
My friend was leaving my house around 11:30pm on 1/28/10. a few minutes after he walked outside, he called me and told me that there was something like a ufo in the sky moving around and that i needed to come outside to see. 

i put on my bathrobe and walked outside to my friend. i had a baby monitor receiver in my robe pocket at that time, and when i walked out into the yard, the signal received some interference and i had to turn it down so that the noise from the interference would stop, which is rather unusual.

it was a really clear night, and the stars were very bright. my friend pointed up to one star and told me to watch. i asked what i would see and he said that it had been moving around the sky erratically and that it had blue and red lights moving around it from time to time.

my roommate also came outside to watch for a minute. at first the object did nothing. my roommate then went back inside stating that he thought it was an illusion from looking at something for too long. at first i thought the same thing but i had a feeling in my gut that it was more than just an illusion.

i kept watching this "star" and soon it appeared to be moving erratically, but in a small area. it seemed to move to the side and down, then up again; rather slowly. then i witnessed what appeared to be small/thin rays of red and blue lights radiating from the object in a circular motion (as if it was shining blue and red flashlights while moving in circles). the lights only lasted a few seconds at a time and then would stop. 

after a few more minutes of this, i got very nervous and decided to go back inside. my friend stayed in my yard for about another 2 hours watching this object. at some point, he states that up to 5 more of these objects started moving in the sky. he said that they would move towards and away from each other, as if they were dancing. all appeared to have the same red and blue light beams every few minutes. 

at one point, my friend said that he got chills and goose-bumps and felt as if something were about to get him, so he got into his vehicle and drove to his house across town. he has since stated that he felt as though "they" knew he was watching and took notice of him. once at his house, he could not see the object(s) anymore. after he was inside, he says that he got a feeling as though something was right outside of his house waiting for him.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star-looking with red and blue lights, moving irratically

content.detailedDescription:
I was around twelve years of age at the time. my mother, sister and i were driving back to our house late in the evening. i was in the back seat and my mom and sister were in the front. we were driving down hwy 45 towards eden when i looked off to the ne (the strange blue jumpy lights grabbed my attention) and roughly a mile to a mile and a half in the distance i saw a large cylindrical object hovering in the sky. below that, however, i saw large "bolts" of lightning coming out of the bottom of this object. it looked like a miniature lightning storm that was "grabbing" a large electrical tower. i remember feeling very scared at the time. my mother kept driving and it seemed as though she didn't even care or blew it off as something other than out of the ordinary.

so here is where i wonder if my young mind was imagining things. while i specifically remember seeing this and my sister and mother seeing this i am the only one who can recall this event. my mom and sister look at me like i'm crazy when i bring this up.

any suggestions? i remember this very vividly and i have remembered it all these years. i believe there was something more to this than just a young imagination.
content.summary: Ufo pulling

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the meteor shower in the early morning hours of november 17, 2009 and saw plenty of meteor activity.  however, i also noticed other light movement that was so unusual i mentioned it to a friend.  she agreed it was odd but i thought no more of it until hearing that troup county has been know to have frequent ufo sightings.  i found this website and was surprised to see an entry that reported a sighting on october 13, 2009 which sounds identical to how i would report my event.  i had been star gazing for about an hour and had seen a nice handful of meteors related to the shower that night.  then i noticed a light with brightness and movement that behaved nothing like i had seen before.  i wondered how these lights could be related to the meteor shower because the brightness and pattern were so very different.  these lights moved much slower and more deliberate than the "shooting stars".  they were brighter than a star so i tried to convince myself if was an airplane but it was faster than the airplanes that i watch flyover on a regular and frequent basis.  additionally, airplanes always fly north and south over our house as they always fly into and out of atlanta.  these lights were going west to east but they also disappeared before they crossed the entire sky whereas you would see an airplane until it flew out of your line of sight.  also, i can always hear the faint and distant sound of an airplane engine - these light movements were silent.  after watching the first light glide across the sky for about 15-20 seconds i saw two or three additional lights appear (or the same light reappear) individually in the same area flying in a similar pattern for similar lengths of time.
content.summary: 2-3 bright star-like objects with unusual movement.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside having a cigarette when i saw them. there were 5 ufos. i shouted to my friends and they saw the ufos with me. i asked my friend to take a photo but they didnt show up on the camera phone. they came from the south south west and were heading north north east then they changed direction and headed straight north. there were 5 of them. four spheres that looked like they were on fire and on triangular one with two red lights. we saw them for about a minute before they disappeared. my first proper ufo sighting.
content.summary: Sighting outside my friends house

content.detailedDescription:
my first wife & i were driveing in our ol' motor home on way to a family gathering(step mothers & father`s side).Anyway, we were about at the idaho -
washington boarder(a high desert area),when i thought i was looking at a huge "harvest-moon" and made comment to my then wifei recall saying something in particular to the buety of how full & bright it looked.She retorted with a less emotional wisp,yet - she wondered how i could be viewing it frontward while she said it looked normal size and was to our back side ?
 after realizeing that the pale-ish yellow moon was indeed to the mh`s far - back southwestwardly side via a stretching look back in my side mirror, i whooped the mh over on a pull-out.I had diane get out w/me and we both stood in awe of the perculiar sight of what appeared to be the regular moon and a real spectactular larger and more white-lite moon-like sight,too.After a few seconds we could see that this larger moon-like thing was seeming to travel along the top of a far-off desert cliff/platoe top,seeming to becomming closer toward us.
 all of a sudden,without a sound or a swing turn, it just str8-away began an assent at a slight upward angle in an at first seemingly fairly slow climb.It stopped briefly - then made a complete square corner turn(not a normal round-ish corner turn at all),then in a very fast and seemingly str8-up bolt, it shot away untill it completely vanished into the starry heavens/space.I say "seemingly" alot, it has since accured to me that this "thing/ufo" must have actualy been possibly larger than our moon and farther away than it looked(or earth satalites and/or  monitors would have informed someone ?).
 i knew it did not fly like anything i'de ever heard or seen, and at the time did not believe it could have been anything american and/or of our planets.I am now not so sure, as have theroes of government secrecies - allowing ufo`s to cover-up war-type expariments (?).Although,i'de have to admit that at last glmpse of whatever it was that we saw, it must've been doing near light-speed (?)!I have no idea "if" *****would still remember out experiance(i do'nt know how she could possibly forget it),or if she'd not "recal" it just in - spite of being my "x",now ? but, i'de be willing to do a "lie-detector" test to back up my belief in whatever it was i saw.
 i have no idea wether anyone else seen it or not, seems we heard some clatter of sightings on a radio w/in a short time of that, but i do remember that we discoused the matter and desided not to make an official sightings-type report to any place at the time. i figured that i probably would just be thought to be "nuts or something" ! as it was, idaho ranchers/farmers did'nt take too kindly to "long-haired" men, especialy ones from "california", at that time.About a year or so later i thought i was seeing another such sighting off of the california coast, near san gregerio beach;but, it soon turned out to be a blurry hellicopter light -
beam, though the engine must've been well mufflered - as it ran fairly quiet,yet not completely silent as the "real" sighting event.
 well, i hope i've amused someone if nothing else ? i seen a program on a pbs channel and heard the name mufon, looked it up on our pc and thought:"why not ?" besides, this can finally be my telling of this story to people who'm may not think i just made-it-all-up or went "crazy" ? after 30 years,someone should know, heh ? i'm not an aventfull ufo watcher, i do'nt even watch the stars.Occassionally i view the "northern lights"=aroera-borealis",or whatever(?) and a comit,or shooting star - but other than that, i like star-treck & sci-fi ! "god bless you folks in your endevers, have fun".-bye,bye.
content.summary: Gigantic bright white-lite circle/sphere,light briliant,though not blinding or petrudeing....:

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: On janurary 26th 2010 around 3am i went outside my house to get fresh air because i wasnt feeling very good.  as i went outside it was a clear blue night with the stars very visible.  as i went around my house i noticed about 10 to 20 miles away in the southwest, a pulsating light with many colors. it seemed to dissapear and reapear, up and down closer to me and then further away.  as i watched i got a wierd feeling to look up.  i then spotted above a very dark but bright orange orb of light. "what a strange star." i thought.  then it bolted away then hovered in another area, directly over my house. i would say about 2 or 3000 ft. up.  as i watched there seem to be white orbs coming and going around the orange orb at light speed.  i was so scared by this sight that i ran in the house to get my girlfriend.  we went back out and i showed her the first pulsating light further away.  she gasped in disbelief! we stood there for a couple of minutes cuz i couldnt see the other one.  then the other reappered out of no where above my house again. it seemed to be flashing lights and then dissapered and reappered while hovering.  my girlfriend gasped and and said "nooo!" then ran into the house. i stood in amazment at what i saw.  she begged me to come back in and i did so.  after fianlly calming down i went back outside.  the orange light was gone and the one further away had moved to the complete opposite side of town. it had moved to the north east side. still about the same distance.  i then noticed possibly a c-130 flying at very low altitudes. it was accompanied by a airplane releasing chemtrails at a very low altitude.  thy sky became cloudy in what seemed a matter of 30 minutes.  i went back inside very distraught at i what i saw.  around 5:45 am my girlfriend got up so i could take her to work. i could not sleep.  we got in the car and as we pulled out we noticed in the northeast sky 2 pulsating flashing lights.  as we drove down the block one light began to move upwards and towards my town.  my girlfriend begged me to hurry and leave.  amazed i drove about 6 miles southbound to her work.  as i pulled up to her work i noticed the flashing light had made its way very close and could be seen moving eraticly and flashing multiple colors.  i then decided that i had to find out if i was really as crazy as this was making me feel.  so i headed eastbound out of town towards the country to get a better look. as a traveled a very dark road i looked up and rolled down the window. i was in complete shock and horror at what i saw.  i slammed my brakes and parked on the shoulder. i got out and stood in awe.  what i saw next was straight out of a sci-fi movie.  there was a widespread chemtrail cloud. in it and above is what seemed like thousands of orbed lights. they seemed to be moving with the cloud. silent i stood in horror.  out of no where i saw what looked like a triangular shaped ufo descend really damn close to me. i could see three distinct orange lights.  and what seemed to be scribling on the underbelly edge.  it hovered and zipped in bursts several times before i completely freaked out and got in my car. i did about 90 mph down this road to a right down a access road by the highway to the nearest convinence store.  the clouds and the fleet where gone! i went inside got a water bottle. as i left i asked the clerk if anyone had come in and reported seeing anything. he stared at me and asked "what did you say?" he could see the fear on me. i told him never mind and left. as i walked to my car i saw the same orange orb about 2 miles to the west. it looked directly above dyess airforce base. it hovered and pulsated. dissapearing and reapearing several times. the clerk then came outside to "see what i was looking at."  we both stood in silence by my car as we watched the orb pulsate and hover. moving closer and further away. at a closer look you could see white orbs zipping to and from it.  finally i left and watched this ufo the entire time.  when i got home the orb had moved closer to my house. i decided to get a closer look so i went to my backyard. i looked at my clock and it was around 6;50 am.  the sun was starting to light the sky. i observed the sky over my town light up with activity. everything from the large strobbing orb to white orbs. diffrent ufo's at diffrent altitudes. what looked like a c-130.  a chemtrail jet.  bomber sounds that could not be seen.  there seem to be a explosion of activity!!  exhausted and petrified i went in to the house. laid down and finally went to sleep. i can only say that what i saw will forecver change me. there here now.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Multiple hovering lights. triangular shaped orbs. white and black orbs. chemtrail clouds with a ufo fleet of hundreds!

content.detailedDescription: My husband had an evening dr's appt in monroe, mi in nov. 2008.  at about, one mile outside of monroe on m50 headed towards dundee, i saw what looked like a flash of lightening (sp) through the drivers side window.  i turned to look and it was visable continually and got so bright it hurt my eyes.  i slowed down pointed it out to my husband and we drove about 5 miles watching the light.  he said it was changing colors (violet, yellow, light blue) while i saw very bright white light that got brighter and brighter, hurting my eyes.  after, 5 miles of watching it we pulled over and got out of the truck and watched the light all the time it was light a streak of lightening.  after, about 5 minutes we got back into the truck and drove to dundee (all together 14 miles) the light was visable the whole time.  we pulled into our driveway and watched it from the tail of the truck for about 2-3 minutes. the entire time it was visable it seemed to be moving evenly with the truck at about a 30 degree angle in the sky.  at the time we went into the house it had dissappeared.  the brightness of the streak caused my eyes to water and the light would intesify.  my husband said that as it got brighter it changed color.  his distance eyesight is better then mine.
content.summary: While driving home from monroe to dundee in nov. 2008 on m50 saw a flash of what first appeared to be lightening.

content.detailedDescription: I had just turned off the tv & was lying in bed looking out the top window of my bedroom (we have cathedral ceilings). i can see the tops of the trees through that window & i was watching them swaying with the wind. i saw what i thought was a white star beyond the trees, but it was really bright. at first i thought maybe it was the north star, but it seemed even brighter than that. chalking it up to a star, i closed my eyes for a couple minutes. i opened them up again & looked out to see the bright light had moved up and over the trees. i then realized it couldn't be a star because of the distance it had moved in that short of time. so i figured it must be an airplane. i kept looking at it then i noticed the faint blink of red & green lights. i noticed that it hadn't changed it's position in the sky since i had been watching it over the trees. as i continued looking at it, it finally moved in some small circular motions, then stopped. then it moved in an up & down motion, then stopped. even when it was moving, it stayed in that same general area, but always stopped right back where it started. i woke my husband so he could look at it too, but he had been horribly sick with a stomach virus, and wasn't really awake, and he never looked out the window. i started getting freaked out & scared & forced myself to roll over and stop looking at it.
content.summary: White star like light in sky...Red & green flashing lights on it...Moved around in erratic circles & up & down

content.detailedDescription: My family & had just gotten off of highway 421, and were driving down styers ferry road in the direction of country club/shallowford road. we were just getting back from thanksgiving out of town, and it was around 9pm. i happened to look to the left at the cow pasture & saw a bright green illuminated ball with a reddish-orange illuminated cone shaped "tail". the cone shape was at a diagonal angle off the top right part of the ball, but they did appear to be connected to each other. it looked like it may have been further off from the cow pasture, but not high in the sky - barely over tree level. i pointed it out to my husband and we were only able to look at it for a few seconds as we drove by (maybe 5 seconds). my initial thought was a meteor, until i realized it didn't move at all.
content.summary: Green illuminated circle with illuminated reddish-orange cone shaped "tail"

content.detailedDescription: upon arriving home from shopping i was looking south from wilsonville.I noted a bright orange round orb approaching from the southeast.At first i thoughtit might be a plane untill it stopped mid-air over the willamette river.The distance i would estimate was between 1/4,and 1/2 mile from my position.The object hung in the air motionless for several minutes.Looking south the first object was joined by another orb that was pulsating different colors.It stopped at the same elevation as the first orb.Both seemed to be about the same diameter although the orange orb was closer to my vantage point.This is my first official report of this occurrance.I have noted lights moving to the river before but have never had the opportunity to have an unobstructed veiw.The orbs hung motionless for a number of minutes at approximatley 500 feet altitude.I went inside to get my binoculars,and upon returning to my vantage spot noted the objects still holding their distance,and altitude but moving together in a northeasterly direction till they both dissappeared behind the trees.Diameter of objects unknown,and they emmited no sound.Duration of event approximatley 20 minutes.I did feel anxiety about what i was seeing.
content.summary: Bright orb approached willamette river stopped was joined by 2nd orb.

content.detailedDescription:
I was returning from a town hall meeting in my small, rural maine town to my home on a rural road.  i was driving my newer model pickup truck.  the time was 8:14pm on january 26th, 2010.  it was fully dark outside and the sky was clear.  this rural road does not have any street lights and there were no other cars on the road.

about a 1/2 mile from my home a very bright white light came from behind me in the sky and flew directly over my truck.  it appeared to be a shooting star, but after approximately a second of watching it, it changed direction from straight away from me to a very sharp angle off to my right.  the object did not slow down, flicker or change intensity as it changed direction.  it simply went from going away from me to going off to my right in the sky.  when it passed over me, it actually lit up the hood of my truck it was that bright.

i estimate i saw the object for approximately one to two seconds before it changed direction, then for approximately another 1/2 - 1 second after it changed direction. . . for a total of approximately 1 1/2 seconds to 3 seconds.  after the object changed direction, it simply disappeared.

at first i couldn't (in my mind) reconcile what i had seen.  it started out as a really bright shooting star in my mind, but when it changed directions so abruptly i couldn't come to terms with what i might have witnessed.
content.summary: Fast, round bright white light with instant direction change

content.detailedDescription:
We've had abnormal weather occurring lately.  two weeks ago we had snow and a deep freeze for days.  as that thawed away, we had fog like i've never seen in our area before.  this past weekend, it felt like spring, nearing the 60s.  but now it has gotten colder again...And we are anticipating a bigger snow storm.  our dog is an english mastiff (big dog!) and for some reason became spooked and barked, and looked toward the door.  he rarely barks.  so, i stepped out of my house for a cigarette, as i normally do.  the barometric pressure was high, thus no clouds and all stars.  i love it when it's like that...You can see every star.  so, i looked over to my neighbor's house to see his heat exhaust go straight into the sky.  that always looks so neat, but two objects just over his garage caught my eye.  from my view, they "looked" like they were over his garage, but were actually about five miles away.  i look into this area every night.  there is a flight pattern for the louisville international airport, but these objects were lower and stationary.  they almost looked stationary like stars, but the lights were bright orange and other lights were flickering at times.  i'm a ufo enthusiast and thought, "i'm finally seeing it!"  i thought no one would believe me, so i bravely woke up my sleeping fiance.  she wasn't too happy, but she humored me and got up to look out.  in the back of my mind, i kind of assumed they'd be gone, but they weren't.  she saw them too.  she still told me that i was crazy, but got my iphone for me.  i snapped the attached picture.  the objects stayed for about 10 minutes until the bottom one gently flew off to the left, or direction-wise east towards louisville.  the top one stayed for much longer.  in the picture, you can see my neighbor's house.  there is a utility pole in front of his house with a bright white light on it.  but just to the left of the pole are the two objects.  they made no sound, but remember, i'm about five miles away from them.  
if these are not ufos, my theory is that they are military helicopters training for urban warfare.  fort knox is about 40 miles south of where i live.
content.summary: Two sheres hovering approximately 400 feet in the air...About five miles away.

content.detailedDescription: We live in orange springs in marion county florida.  the way my chair sits in my living room it faces a window that overlooks a spring fed brook which is about 75ft away from my house. i was talking to my fiance on the phone he was on his way home on an adjacent road to our house cr318.  i looked out the window opposite my chair across the room and saw this real bright light. i thought at first it was a plane or something like that, it was i mean just above the tree line.  i kept looking as i was talking to my fiance and this thing just stopped!!! and hung there. i hollered at my fiance over the phone oh my god i think i am seeing a ufo. at that point it started moving again.  super super bright light almost like a floating star. i ran outside while i had my fiance on the phone saying oh my god oh my god its a ufo..All the sudden he hollered oh crap i can see it from here.  this is how bright this sucker was.  then he started watching it as it went out of my vision and he caught it.  and as quick as we had seen it. he went crap it disappeared.  then he said i dont know what that was but it wasnt any plane i have ever seen before.  there was no noise just the bright light and some type of red lights not plane lights i know what they look like.  then he said i dont know what that was but now there are planes all over the place here. i can see four or five of them flying around where that thing was.  well i dont know about anyone else but im telling you right now that was not any normal plane i have ever seen
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright slow moving light

content.detailedDescription: Approximately may, 10th, 2008 at 7pm, i was leaving my son's house in bangor, pa. as i sat in my car, i noticed a black chevron-shaped object with five huge, bright red disc-shaped lights underneath moving noiselessly over the house. it was dusk and the object was about the size of a 727 traveling at about 180 mph at an altitude of about 500 feet. having advanced knowledge of conventional and military aircraft, i realized that this object was neither of these because all five lights were blinking on and off simultaneously. in other words, they would all go out for one second and then all come on for one second. i used my cell phone to call my mother in nj as a witness to what i was describing. i told her i was seeing a ufo and was going to follow it with my car. my son's house is on rt. 512. the object followed rt. 512 for about one mile. i trailed it with my car and as rt. 512 makes a sharp right, the ufo went straight and i watched the object fly off over the mountains until it was out of sight. i remember being fascinated and thinking that this was definitely not something from this earth. i also recall being amazed at the large size of the lights and their bright red color. it was my first ufo sighting and i was thrilled. oddly enough, my son told me that he had seen the same black, chevron-shaped object over bangor, pa only a week before in broad daylight. he said the red lights were off because of the time of day. he told me that he was afraid to tell anyone for fear they would think he was crazy. i remember thinking that a lot of people must have seen this object on the same night that i had seen it because we were on the main street in a small, densely populated town and the object was in plain view at dusk, flying low right down the main street. it was still light enough to see it clearly. it reminded me of the sightings of the phoenix lights and it looked just like them, except on a smaller scale.
content.summary: Sighting of black chevron-shaped object with 5 red blinking lights underneath, moving northeast over bangor, pa approximately may, 2008 at 10pm.
